```{r setup}
library(lab4linreg)
```

```{r}
data(iris)

# Fit a ridge regression model
ridge_model <- ridgereg(Sepal.Length ~ Petal.Length + Petal.Width, data = iris, lambda = 0.5)

# 1. Extract coefficients using the coef() method
coefficients <- coef(ridge_model)
print(coefficients)

# 2. Predict on new data
# Create a new data frame with values for prediction
new_data <- data.frame(Petal.Length = c(5.1, 2.3, 3.4), 
                       Petal.Width = c(1.8, 0.5, 1.1))

# Get predictions for the new data
predicted_values <- predict(ridge_model, newdata = new_data)
print(predicted_values)
```
